description: The Stealhead Hoodie is a sustainable blend of style and comfort. Featuring unique artwork by Alana Louise, adjustable hood, rib-knit cuffs, and a handy kangaroo pocket. GRS, GOTS, and Oeko-Tex® certified. Elevate your wardrobe with this eco-friendly statement piece.
name: Hooke Steelhead Pullover Hoodie - Mens
